messages.speech:
Depending on your operating system, here's what Office includes:

    PC includes Access, Excel, Skype for Business, OneNote, Outlook, PowerPoint, Publisher, and Word
    Mac includes Excel, OneNote, Outlook, PowerPoint, and Word

Also know that:

    Mac users can install Skype for Business separately
    Project Pro for Office 365 and Visio Pro for Office 365 are available as additional subscriptions through Office 365

You can also install the latest version of Office on your Surface Pro. You'll have all the same programs as Office on a PC.

For more information on how to install the latest version of Microsoft Office from your Office 365 account, watch Students - Free and Reduced Software.
